jobs.description: One of the biggest food delivery companies in Brazil. Here, I'm on the development experience tribe, improving maintainability and developing new features in systems related to iFood Developers.
A company focused on IA and security. I create APIs using microservice architecture to integrate with IA(Torch Server) systems to distribute features related to face recognition.
A company focused on telephony facilities. My work here was improving maintainability and developing new features for the payment systems.
A B2W(currently Americanas SA) company. Tribe focused on PDV for the Americanas stores, using events architecture to synchronize data between PDV and cloud services.

One of the biggest retail companies in Brazil, currently Americanas SA. I worked in some systems focused on retail business, such as supplier payment anticipation, supplier portal, document assignment and other focused systems on payment.
A federal institution focused on astronomy. Developed some hot-sites for ON projects.
